javolver

Class Javolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • javolver.Javolver

  • public class Javolver
extends java.lang.Object
    Javolver is a simple engine that processes a pool of individuals using genetic selection. The user must derive a class from the Individual class and supply an object of this derived type to the constructor.
    Since:
    2016-04-01

    • Method Detail

      • getBestScore

        public double getBestScore()
        Find the best score of any individual in the current generation.
        Returns:
        The best score of any individual in the current generation.

      • runUntilMaximum

        public void runUntilMaximum()
        experimental function to run the system until improvement slows.

      • increasePopulation

        public void increasePopulation(int targetCount)
        Add a number of randomly initialized genes to the population, until it reaches specified size.
        Parameters:
        targetCount - The target number of individuals that the population will reach.

      • doOneCycle

        public void doOneCycle()
        The main function that does most of the work to evolve the system.
        1. All individuals scoring mechanisms get called.
        2. The best scoring individual is automatically moved to the next generation.
        3. A new generation of individuals is created by breeding selected member from the current generation.

        The size of the new pool will match the previous generation population.

      • report

        public java.lang.String report()
        Return a string containing some basic information about the state of the system.
        Returns:
        String containing simple report

      • scoreGenes

        public void scoreGenes(java.util.ArrayList<Individual> pool)
        Triggers each individual in the pool to calculate it's score.
        Parameters:
        pool - ArrayList of individuals to be scored.

      • findBestScoringIndividual

        public Individual findBestScoringIndividual(java.util.ArrayList<Individual> pool)
        Search the supplied pool of individuals and return the highest scoring one.
        Parameters:
        pool - The pool of individuals to select from.
        Returns:
        Highest scoring member of the supplied list.
